summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 5, 6 and the north 15 feet of Lot 7, Block "A", Sea Shore Addition to Alki Point, and the north 42 feet of Lot 2, Block 20, Dewey's Addition; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-270 and 17-218, respectively.
